thread.title: The Pack preps to take on New Mexico
thread.title_full: The Pack preps to take on New Mexico

title: The Pack preps to take on New Mexico
text: Share Updated: 10/09 12:10 pm RENO, Nev. -- News 4 continues to Back the Pack this week as Nevada hosts New Mexico on Saturday.The game kicks off at Mackay Stadium at 4 p.m.Nevada comes off a tough home loss against southern rival UNLV last week.Nevada went down 23 to 17.The Pack is looking to even out their record on the season, which currently sits at 2-3.The New Mexico Lobos have an opposite record -- 3-2 -- and have a two game winning streak as they head into Reno. News 4, Fox 11, My 21 and News 10 in Elko are partnering with the Nevada Wolf Pack to raise Game Day awareness with our #Backthepack campaign. We’re challenging the entire community to show off their Pack Pride in two ways: Post videos and pictures to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram—and other social media outlets—using hashtag #backthepack to show off your Pack Pride; show us your killer tailgating traditions, Game Day rituals, kiddos decked out in Wolf Pack gear… the sky’s the limit! Snap a photo of a local business that is going above and beyond in showing their Pack Pride with a cool display or event; that business could get a visit from our #backthepack street team and be featured on the news! Thanks for standing with the Pack and being part of the movement. Get started by connecting with us on Facebook or search Instagram and Twitter using hashtag #backthepack
